page.title: 04The Two Wentworth Churches
page.content: There are{two churches}in{Wentworth. The{oldest}church was probably built in the{12th century.}Now it is a ruin. The{oldest grave}dates back from the {16th century.}Some of the graves have crumbled away and fallen down.Part of the roof has fallen in and ivy has over grown it. The{new church}still stands up.The new church has got a {steeple}unlike the old church which has a{tower.}The{new church}was built between{1873}and{1877.}The new church steeple is{200 feet high.}The design for the{new church}was also used for {Truro Cathedral.}Inside the new church everything is clean and well kept but inside the old church there are weeds growing through the floor. The graves around the old church are old and over grown with ivy and grass. The graves around the new church are neat and tidy and well looked after.
